name: prettierlichess
description: Here is the source code for both the chrome and firefox extension! It's simple but it's mine. Feel free to download, fork, use, and mess with it all you want. No attribution or anything required.

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.watch: npx concurrently --names "chrome,firefox" --prefix-colors "blue,red" "BROWSER=chrome npx webpack -w" "BROWSER=firefox npx webpack -w"
scripts.popup:run: npm run build:chrome && cd dist-chrome && node ../testing/popupServer.js
scripts.cy:popup: cypress run --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/testPopup.cy.js' && cypress run --browser firefox --spec 'cypress/e2e/testPopup.cy.js'
